text: 15:8 Ua Me Ini 40:34; 1 Atriviba 8:10-11; 2 Eghaghaniba 5:13-14; Aisaia 6:4; Esekiel 44:4; 2 Tesalonika 1:9Ezɨ Godɨn Dɨpenim, an angazangarim ko an gavgavimɨn mɨgharim, bar a gizɨfa. Kamaghɨn amizɨ gumazitam dɨpenimɨn aven mangan kogham. Me kamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨ 7plan enselba, 7plan bizir bar kurar gumazamizibagh asɨghasɨghamin ingangarim gɨvagham.
